dt-api.name: cells().nodes()
dt-api.summary: Get the DOM elements for the selected cells

type.description: Get the DOM elements for the selected cells
type.returns: DataTables API instance with the `dt-tag TD` / `dt-tag TH` cell elements in the set

dt-api.description: This method, used in-combination with the `-api cells()` method (and therefore the various selector forms that it allows) will obtain the DOM nodes for the selected cells, allowing them to be directly manipulated - for example adding a class.

example.title: Add a class to the selected cells
